oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A View of Memphis
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: sketches; riverfront; Mississippi River; boats; 1870s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "A View of Memphis, Tenn." appeared on page 305 of the September 23, 1871 issue of Every Saturday.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Illustrations from Harper's Weekly Newspaper and Frank Leslie's Illustrated Newspaper
